name: Set Phasers to Thrust v1.5
description:
The players ship has malfunctioned and is "Out of Control." The pilot improvises by using his gun to propel the ship through space.

 GMTK Game Jam 2020 Submission

Version 1.5 Update:

New Phaser shot, Better Pacing,  New Levels, and Main Menu Screen

Stay tuned Version 2.0 coming next Sunday 7/26!
